title: Not without sight
creator_credit: Arthur Zigouras, Joshua Aronson and American Foundation for the Blind
brief_description: Uses the example of four people with different kind of eye trouble in order to show the main courses of visual impairment and to show how these impairments affect sight.
creator_credit_for_label: Arthur Zigouras, Joshua Aronson and American Foundation for the Blind
